name: Gallery
description: Gallery is a component of Backendless UI-Builder designer. It allows to conveniently view images and stay on the page.

properties.name: imagesData
properties.label: Images Data
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for getting data for rendering images. Type of data is an array of objects, every object should have field "url" with image URL, optionally field "title" with text for every image and field "height" with height of current image.
properties.settingTooltip: This is a setting for getting data for rendering images.

properties.name: wrapAround
properties.label: Wrap Around
properties.settingTooltip: This checkbox toggling possibility to make the gallery infinite. If checked, when a user reaches the last image in a set, the right navigation arrow will appear and they will be to continue moving forward, which will take them back to the first image in the set.

properties.name: alwaysShowNavOnTouchDevices
properties.label: Nav On Mobile
properties.settingTooltip: This checkbox toggles the visibility of the navigation on touchscreen devices. If true, the left and right navigation arrows which appear on mouse hover when viewing image sets will always be visible on devices which support touch.

properties.name: disableScrolling
properties.label: Disable Scrolling
properties.settingTooltip: This checkbox toggles scroll possibility. If true, prevent the page from scrolling while Lightbox is open. This works by setting overflow hidden on the body.

properties.name: showImageCount
properties.label: Show Image Count
properties.settingTooltip: This checkbox toggling indicator visibility of the number of images If unchecked, the text indicating the current image number and the total number of images in the set (Ex. "image 2 of 4") will be hidden.

properties.name: imageLabel
properties.label: Image Label
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set the text in indicator of images. It works if "Show Image Number Label" is true.

properties.name: separator
properties.label: Separator
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set separator in indicator of images. It works if "Show Image Number Label" is true.

properties.name: fadeDuration
properties.label: Fade Duration(ms)
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set the time of fade duration. The time it takes for the Lightbox container and overlay to fade in and out, in milliseconds.

properties.name: imageFadeDuration
properties.label: Image Fade Duration(ms)
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set the time of image fade duration. The time it takes for the image to fade in once loaded, in milliseconds.

properties.name: resizeDuration
properties.label: Resize Duration(ms)
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set the time it takes for the Lightbox container to animate its width and height when transition between different size images, in milliseconds.

properties.name: positionFromTop
properties.label: Position From Top(px)
properties.settingTooltip: This option is to set the distance from top of the viewport that the Lightbox container will appear, in pixels.
